titles.title: A bill to require certain payments made to victims of Nazi persecution to be disregarded in determining eligibility for and the amount of benefits or services based on need, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4926-4927)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 4/27/1993--Introduced. Disregards payments made to victims of Nazi persecution in determining eligibility for and the amount of need-based benefits and services under any Federal or federally assisted program.
